General.Name: China Hainan Rubber Industry Group Co Ltd
General.Description: China Hainan Rubber Industry Group Co., Ltd. research, develops, plants, and processes rubber wood in China. The company offers latex silk, natural rubber latex, aviation tire standard rubber, meridian rubber, light color glue, and standard rubber products. It is also involved in trading, processing, and rubber planting business, as well as engages in e-commerce, and agriculture related services. In addition, the company focuses on warehousing and logistics activities. China Hainan Rubber Industry Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Haikou, China. The company operates as a subsidiary of Hainan Agricultural Reclamation Investment Holding Group Co., Ltd.
